CMS-Dashboard.DataChange:
Thank you.  
We have received your change request and this will be reviewed by the curation
team and updated accordingly.  
Please be aware that you may not see any changes for upto 24 hours.
CMS-Dashboard.Distribute: options will be enabled and we can create your SPW and distribute your content to our partners.
CMS-Dashboard.Download: Download your website links and QR codes
CMS-Dashboard.GoodWork: Good work so far but we need a bit more information to generate your Single Page Website (SPW). The summary below should indicate which sections still need additional content. Once you've added enough data, the
CMS-Dashboard.HasBeenPublished: has been successfully published and has been synchronised with all Restaurant Collective content subscribers. You can view your page or copy the URL (link) using the options below.
CMS-Dashboard.IfCorrect: (Single Page Website) to verify your content. If everything is correct then press
CMS-Dashboard.NeedMoreContent: WE NEED A BIT MORE CONTENT
CMS-Dashboard.NewOffer: There is another new offer available to Full Members, make sure you check it out!
CMS-Dashboard.NewOffers: new offers available to Full Members, make sure you check them out!
CMS-Dashboard.NotPublished: The latest changes that you have made have not yet been published. Please
CMS-Dashboard.Sync: to synchronise with all Restaurant Collective subscribers.
CMS-Dashboard.ToSee: to see what the SPW will look like with full content added.
CMS-Dashboard.ViewDemo:
Good work so far but we need a bit more information to generate your Single Page Website (SPW). The summary below should indicate which sections still need additional content. Once you've added enough data, the **PREVIEW** and **PUBLISH** options will be enabled and we can create your SPW and distribute your content to our partners.  

You can [view a demo restaurant version]({{ demoUrl }}) top see what the **SPW** will look like with content added.

CMS-Directory.Knowledge: To the best of your knowledge, is the directory information displayed for

CMS-Menus.MenuHelp: Add a selection of your most popular dishes. We would recommend that you choose a cross-section of your price range and dishes that best reflect your style of food. You can flag dishes as
CMS-Menus.VGF: Add a selection of your most popular dishes. We would recommend that you choose a cross-section of your price range and dishes that best reflect your style of food. You can display the dishes as ![Vegetarian](../assets/images/icons/vegetarian.svg) **Vegetarian**, ![Vegan](../assets/images/icons/vegan.svg) **Vegan** or ![Gluten Free](../assets/images/icons/gluten-free.svg) **Gluten Free** when you add them.
CMS-Menus.Want: - is that what you want to do?

CMS-Reservations.GroupPolicy: What is your policy for group bookings? (max.
CMS-Reservations.NoOnlineBookingsMessage: Please ensure that you complete the **General** information section, giving details of how customers can book in advance, outlining your policy regarding reservations and including any special telephone numbers etc.
CMS-Reservations.NoTest: This service does not require testing - it does not have an associated URL
CMS-Reservations.ValidEmail: A valid email address is required
CMS-Reservations.ValidTelephone: A valid telephone number is required

CMS-SPW-Links.Copy: Copy the SPW link to your clipboard
CMS-SPW-Links.LinkInfo: The website link, or URL, above is a permanent link to the Single Page Website (SWP) that is automatically generated by Restaurant Collective. This link can be shared with customers or partners via any digital medium.
CMS-SPW-Links.Open: Open published SPW in a new window
CMS-SPW-Links.QRInfo: QR Codes are special images that carry information about a website location. Most modern smartphone or tablet devices will recognise and decode these images, via their camera apps, and provide an option to visit the relevant web page directly.
CMS-SPW-Links.SPWInfo: The SPW can also be set up to work on a custom domain (e.g. www.your-domain.com). It can be an existing domain name, or we can register a suitable domain name for you.
CMS-SPW-Links.Usage: Use these links in any 'offline' situation to provide an easy way for your customers to access the website, or menus, on their smartphone or tablet. You can copy the QR code to your computer using right-click or long-press on the image.

JOIN.joinSuccess:
# Ok thanks!

A member of our Support & Curation Team will be in contact with you shortly.

**{{ brand }} Curation Team**
JOIN.joinUsByReferral:
# Join us{{ referrer }}

You've been invited by {{ referrer }} to become part of {{ brand }}, an exciting new organisation that has been exclusively created to support both independent and group restaurants, and affect positive change within the industry. To join us:

 1. Provide your name and contact details

 2. Select your subscription option

 3. Pay your subscription online

If you experience any problems activating your membership then do please [contact our Support Team]({{ email }}).
JOIN.joinUsToday:
# Join us!

Just complete the following 3 steps and you'll soon be part of an exciting organisation:

 1. Provide your name and contact details

 2. Select your subscription option

 3. Pay your subscription online

If you experience any problems activating your membership then do please [contact our Support Team]({{ email }}).
JOIN.joinWelcome:
# Welcome

You've successfully registered yourself as a **Member** and we've sent you login details and along with some further information.

Close this window and check your email.

Many thanks.

**{{ brand }} Curation Team**
JOIN.msgCheckEmail: Check your email for sign in credentials

MARKETPLACE.dealRequest:
## {{ name }}

If you would like to take advantage of this exclusive Member offer, or would like to know a bit more about it, confirm your interest below.

We will forward your contact details and Member ID to **{{ affiliate.name }}** and they will contact you within 2 working days with further details.

This is just to register you interest and there's no obligation on your part to proceed, unless you decide to.

MEMBERSHIP.instructions:
Please select your preferred **{{ brand }}** subscription option.

You will be taken to the checkout stage, where you can review your subscription before paying securely online using your preferred method

If you have a **PROMOCODE** then you can apply it at the same time.
MEMBERSHIP.terms: Please take the time to read the [Terms of Membership]({{ terms }}) and [Privacy Policy]({{ privacy }}). By becoming a member of Restaurant Collective you are confirming your acceptance of these terms.

MESSAGES.welcomeNewMember:
# You're in!

It's great that you've chosen to join Restaurant Collective and we hope that you'll help us to grow this exciting community of industry professionals and independent restaurateurs.

## Add your restaurant

Before you start exploring the Member's Hub, please complete the initial set up by linking your restaurant to your membership account.

When you're ready, select the **START HERE** option below.

Find your restaurant and follow the on-screen instructions to verify the details and link it to your Membership.

If you need any help, then open the **Knowledge Base** and see the **Getting Started** guide.

Restaurant-Lookup.NotYetCurated:
** has not yet been curated. However, the team has now been notified and curation will take place within the next 48 hours.

Restaurant-Lookup.Sorry: Sorry, we don't have any restaurants listed that match your search. You can add your restaurant using the option below.

password.instructions: Your new password must be at least 8 characters long.

referral.instructions:
This is a personal referral code which you can send to your colleagues and associates to encourage them to join you in supporting **{{ brand }}**.

Copy the link and paste it into an email, text message, or to your Social Media of choice!

SIGNIN.errorUserUnauthorised: Unauthorised login attempt - please check your details
SIGNIN.introduction:
# Let's work together

It’s time someone levelled the playing field for independent operators like you.

Welcome to the Restaurant Collective. We’re a member-owned, non-profit organisation on a mission.
We want to empower and champion independent hospitality operators.
SIGNIN.newPwdSent: A new password has been sent to your email address
SIGNIN.resetPwdInstructions: Enter your registered email address to reset your password. You may need to check your spam folder.
